channel.title: BakkesMod Programming Wiki
channel.description: Recent content on BakkesMod Programming Wiki

item.title: BAKKESMOD_PLUGIN_API_VERSION
item.description: View Implementation Current plugin API Version BAKKESMOD_PLUGIN_API_VERSION = 95

item.title: CONST_DegToUnrRot
item.description: View Implementation Multiply a degree (from 0-360°) by this value to get a rotation value to pass to a Rotator CONST_DegToUnrRot = 182.0444f

item.title: CONST_PI_D
item.description: View Implementation The value of Pi as a double CONST_PI_D = 3.14159265358979323846

item.title: CONST_PI_F
item.description: View Implementation The value of Pi as a float CONST_PI_F = 3.1415926f

item.title: CONST_RadToUnrRot
item.description: View Implementation Multiply a radian (from 0-2π) by this value to get a rotation value to pass to a Rotator CONST_RadToUnrRot = 10430.3783504704527f

item.title: CONST_UnrRotToRad
item.description: View Implementation Multiply a rotation value from a Rotator by this value to get radians (from 0-2π) CONST_UnrRotToRad = 0.00009587379924285f

item.title: quat_norm
item.description: View Implementation Used in linmath.h quat_norm = vec4_norm
